review: The performance is awesome for such a little thing. The only problem is that it doesn't go to sleep automatically. i.e. it continues to use energy even when you are not using it for hours. I wish they fix this issue with a firmware update or something.Even if they fix this issue as this stick needs its own charger (as it needs a currency that can't be provided by regular usb connections), the energy consumption is unnecessarily high even if it goes to standby or something as chargers in general waste energy even if the device is off.

review: Really nice product. No problem connecting it to our wireless network and it works great for accessing Amazon Prime content. Too bad they didn't spend a little more development on the screen sharing feature. Would have made it a "10" if they would have.
